result.description: Script that processes a verification form, and returns whether the user was successfully verified
result.name: Verification form processor

result.description: Script to perform additional operations after the completion of the password reset process
result.name: Post reset script

result.description:
Script that checks whether a user is enrolled in a specified verification.
Returns boolean telling whether the user is enrolled.
result.name: Enrollment check

result.description:
Script that processes an identification form.
Returns the sys-id of the user that corresponds to the requested input; if no user was found, null should be returned.
result.name: Identification form processor

result.description: Script that returns an auto-generated password
result.name: Generate password

result.description:
Script that processes an enrollment request (form).
Returns boolean telling whether the user was successfully enrolled
result.name: Enrollment form processor

result.description: Script that returns the credential-store account id for a given user
result.name: User account lookup
